Posted By: Omenchild (4/16/2010 8:42:03 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Why does this card have the same rating as cards that do almost nothing? Yeah, maybe because this card does almost nothing, too.. However, there are situations where I would happily pay life to prevent lethal damage to my favourite creature, although I wouldn't also spend one card and four mana.. Then again, I'd rather create a +1/+1 counter with [Unspeakable Symbol](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unspeakable Symbol) to save my creature.. Still, this card probably deserves a rating of maybe 0.8 or 0.9 or even 1.0 because it's not one of the worst cards in Magic like the other cards with a rating of 0.6! :)
posts.html:
Why does this card have the same rating as cards that do almost nothing? Yeah, maybe because this card does almost nothing, too.. However, there are situations where I would happily pay life to prevent lethal damage to my favourite creature, although I wouldn't also spend one card and four mana.. Then again, I'd rather create a +1/+1 counter with Unspeakable Symbol to save my creature.. Still, this card probably deserves a rating of maybe 0.8 or 0.9 or even 1.0 because it's not one of the worst cards in Magic like the other cards with a rating of 0.6! :)
